info.name: DSofts IT Services API - Render Deployment
info.description:
Complete API collection for DSofts IT Services backend deployed on Render

## Base URL
https://dsofts-server-bj3s.onrender.com

## Authentication
Most endpoints require a Bearer token. After signup/login, the token will be automatically saved to the `authToken` variable.

## Test Credentials

### Admin User
- Email: admin@dsofts.com
- Password: admin123

### Regular User
- Email: john@example.com
- Password: password123

## Testing Flow

1. **Health Check** - Verify API is running
2. **Signup/Login** - Get authentication token
3. **Public APIs** - Test projects and services (no auth required)
4. **User APIs** - Test client projects (requires auth)
5. **Admin APIs** - Test admin operations (requires admin role)

## Notes
- All timestamps are in ISO 8601 format
- IDs are automatically captured in variables for easy testing
- Admin endpoints require admin role

  "completedAt": "2025-01-15T00:00:00.000Z",
  "isFeatured": true
}
